totalBeforeReliefs.description: Total Income tax before allowances and reliefs and deductions are applied

taxableIncome.description: The total income subject to Income Tax calculation

payPensionsProfit.description: An object containing data to the calculation of income tax against Pay Pensions and profit

savingsAndGains.description: An object containing tax band data for savings interest from banks or building societies, securities and gains on life policies

dividends.description: An object containing data to the calculation of income tax against dividend income

totalAllowancesAndReliefs.description: The total of allowances and reliefs

allowancesAndReliefs.description: An object containing the allowances and reliefs applied
